parameters.prompt: dream-pop, melancholic, nostalgic, electric piano, subtle percussion, reverb-drenched
parameters.lyrics: [verse] The streetlights hum a lullaby / As midnight pulls the curtains tight / Your ghost still lingers in the air / A whisper fading into light [chorus] We built a home in borrowed time / Now all thats left are empty rhymes / The echoes dance but never stay / Like fireflies in yesterday [verse] The clock hands move but time stands still / Your laughter lingers on the sill / I trace the cracks where we once stood / A masterpiece misunderstood [chorus] We built a home in borrowed time / Now all thats left are empty rhymes / The echoes dance but never stay / Like fireflies in yesterday [bridge] Maybe someday the tides will turn / And all these pages left to burn / Will light the way back to your door / But not tonight, not anymore [outro] The streetlights dim, the music fades / Just shadows left of our parades / Goodbye my almost, my nearly there / My almost love, my almost air
